title: Advice Columnist
body: Dear Dave fans bereft of moral compass. Dissatisfied with “hiking the Appalachian Trail” yarn. Have concerns about lavish expenditures.

title: XL Razor Scooter
body: Twizzler-armed code monkey needs beefed-up ride. Hallways at work like the autobahn. Motorized “scooters” preferred. Tweet @chowdahead.

title: Knighthood
body: Frenzy ultra runner looking to shed weight. Can’t bear the burden of “Sir” title. Call Sir Brian Kent.

title: Intervention Expert
body: Riding partner has lost all common sense. Rode Flag in sub-zero temps. Claims the three falls “enriched his life.” Hitting Vegas with Charlie Sheen this weekend. Please help.

title: Bad-natured Trash Talk
body: Last seen wearing speedo. Abnormally furry. Responds to “Dave” or “Peaches”.

title: Spare Tire
body: Former cyclist recently discovered he’s fat. Months of liposuction are not helping. Must now pay for said suction. $10 OBO.

title: Soul
body: May belong to cycling blog. Amateur bondo work concealed by duct tape. Would pass inspection in FL. Call Mephisto.

title: Executive Assistant
body: Seeking someone who can xmas shop. Impeccable taste a must. Knowledge of Dollar Store and Savers a plus. Contact HQ.

title: Over-Ambitious Route Scout
body: Cycling blog running out of crazy routes to ride. Must lack ability to gauge distances and elevations. Contact Frenzy HQ.

title: Almost New Bike Shorts
body: Seller quit cycling. Strange rash. For more info ssh into “spot”, finger “baileysm”, and find the “plan”.

title: Cyclists Who Bathe
body: Showering will do. Willing to overlook all other foibles. Tired of odorous regulars. Contact the mule deer of Flagstaff Mountain.

title: Gently Used Blog
body: Working condition. Shiftless "contributors" can be deleted. Owner motivated to sell. Free/OBO. Call Steve.
